articles.title: A&E nurse cheered out of hospital by colleagues after Covid-19 recovery - Nursing Times
articles.description: Senior nurse Alicia Borja leaves Northwick Park Hospital in Harrow, Greater London after recovering from Covid-19. Her colleagues cheered, clapped and played...
articles.content: Senior nurse Alicia Borja leaves Northwick Park Hospital in Harrow, Greater London after recovering from Covid-19. Her colleagues cheered, clapped and played her favourite music.
